name: s62_fitverse
description: **Fitverse** is a fitness tracker app designed to help users monitor their physical activity, diet, and fitness progress. It provides a platform for users to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) fitness-related data, such as workout plans, nutrition logs, and progress charts. The goal of Fitverse is to keep users consistent, motivated, and engaged in their fitness journey with an intuitive and interactive interface.
